themes.name: Great Sea Navigator
themes.author: EmuLink Team
themes.description: Live minimap showing Link's real-time position on the Great Sea chart with heading, hearts, and compass.

themes.name: Hunter's Eye
themes.author: EmuLnk Team
themes.description: Live monster HP bar and radar for Monster Hunter Freedom Unite. Shows hidden monster health, species name, and real-time positions on a radar map.
